TextView.android:text: Farm Radio - Bringing Agriculture Closer to You

Farm radio is a groundbreaking initiative introduced by the Extension Centre of ANGRAU. It is the first of its kind, an Internet Radio accessible wherever there's an Internet connection, eliminating geographical boundaries. While terrestrial radio requires proximity to a station, online radio is accessible globally, revolutionizing the way we access and listen to broadcasts.

Access to the Internet is so easy these days, with long WiFi ranges, public places offering free internet access, and 4G/LTE mobile data. Unlike AM/FM, as stations are limited to their transmitter, online radio is everywhere and accessible at any time, whether you have a smartphone, laptop, or tablet â€“ check in on your station wherever you are, be it at home or on the other side of the World. As for listeners, anyone with an Internet connection can listen to farm radio, meaning a wide audience to attract, literally billions of potential people ready to connect and listen to farm Radio.
Farm radio gives freedom to podcast what you want and when you want it, with better sound qualities to listeners.
